nodes.text: The Smuggler's Handbook or Platt's Smuggler Handbook was a book written by the legendary smuggler Platt Okeefe. It was designed to help provide a general overview of the smuggling business for new smugglers. It covered different kinds of employers, different ways to acquire a ship, supply locations and a number of contacts to help out.
The "Smuggler's Handbook" is the in-universe name for Platt's Smugglers Guide.
